page.title: 16Changes within a lifetime
page.content: The adults{interviewed}listed a variety of changes that had happened in Clovelly in their lifetime. At school "you had to sit at your desk all day";"there used to be a wall between the boys and girls playground" and someone said "I had to walk 2 miles to school every day 40 years ago". Many commented on the amount of fresh people who have come here to live but that the place itself had not changed. More people have cars; more have bathrooms in their houses and it was said that more people can swim nowadays. Fewer people go to church today. Someone thought there were fewer flowers and varieties of flowers today. There also used to be a big passenger steamer call here regularly and more dances in the old days.
